data.actual_result: It does not do so, and you get louder and louder hoping the Discord elves one day hear your pleas
data.expected_result: The bar lights up green to indicate that Discord can hear you, as happens when you disable voice activity and observe the test window
data.short_description: Voice Activity test bar in User Settings does not work
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings -> Voice - Ensure Voice activity is enabled and all of the correct microphone permissions are enabled - Try speaking
